meanings.definition: In an unsuccessful or incomplete manner
meanings.sent1: The experiment ended abortively before any results could be obtained.
meanings.sent2: She tried to fix the broken toy, but it ended abortively.
meanings.sent3: The cake baking attempt ended abortively, leaving everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: His efforts to learn a new language were abortively halted by a lack of time.
meanings.sent5: The rocket launch was abortively stopped due to technical issues.

meanings.definition: In a manner that results in failure or termination
meanings.sent1: The negotiations ended abortively, leading to no agreement.
meanings.sent2: The project was abortively canceled due to budget constraints.
meanings.sent3: The race ended abortively when the participants took a wrong turn.
meanings.sent4: Her attempts to start a business were abortively thwarted by legal issues.
meanings.sent5: The concert was abortively interrupted by a sudden power outage.
